translation.fr:
J'habite ici !
Mais toi, que fais-tu là ?

translation.en: I can't believe I bought your bullshit. "She's nothing. She's not even pretty."
translation.fr:
Dire que j'ai cru tes conneries. "C'est juste une collègue.
Même pas jolie."

translation.en: Well, at least you were honest about one thing.
translation.fr:
Au moins,
tu étais honnête sur un point.

translation.en: -You said that? -I did not.
-He did. -No, I didn't.
translation.fr:
- Si, il l'a dit.
- C'est faux !

translation.en: -Yes, he said that. -Look....
I'm sorry, could you just give me some time--?
translation.fr:
Laisse-moi un moment
que je puisse...

translation.en: You're asking me to leave?
-No. -Yes, you. I'm the fiancée.
translation.fr:
- Non.
- Oui. Je suis sa fiancée.

translation.en: -You told me you broke it off with her. -I did.
translation.fr: Tu m'avais dit que tu avais rompu. C'est la vérité !

translation.en: You break up with me over the phone?
translation.fr:
Tu crois qu'on rompt
au téléphone ?

translation.en: -I'm out of here. You told me it was over. -No. Ali.
translation.fr:
Je me casse.
T'avais dit que c'était fini !

translation.en: -Ali, please. -What, Jack?
-I am sorry. -So am I.
I'm out.
Ali, wait. Please.
I must have the wrong apartment.
Who are you looking for?
-I'm looking for Sean. -Sean.
What's he look like?
Yea high.
Shaved head.
Brown eyes. Glasses.
Sean.
I've been calling him John.
translation.fr: J'ai pas arrêté de l'appeler John.

translation.en: No, it's Sean.
Is that him?
-What are you doing here? -It's a long story.
translation.fr: Que fais-tu ici ? C'est une longue histoire.

translation.en: I shouldn't have come here. I see I've obviously interrupted something.
translation.fr:
Je n'aurais pas dû venir.
Visiblement, je vous dérange.

translation.en: Might be a bad time.
No, that's okay.
I'm sorry. Ali, did you meet...
-...Mike? -Close. My name is Mark.
Does anybody want any coffee?
Yeah. Why don't I go make the coffee...
...and you guys get better acquainted.
Sorry. Did I call you Mike last night?
translation.fr: Je t'ai appelé Mike, hier soir ?

translation.en: -But I called you John, so.... -Really?
translation.fr:
- Mais je t'ai appelé John...
- Sérieux ?

translation.en: You liked it.
John was my mother's name.
translation.fr: C'était le prénom de ma mère.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, gorgeous.
Hey, Marcus.
You okay? You sound down.
translation.fr: Ça va ? Tu as l'air déprimée.

translation.en: I've been better.
Well, I have just the cure.
-What's that? -Me.
Why don't you come over for dinner?
You take care...
-...Sean. -You too. Okay.
Is Ali here?
Ali left.
She went with Marcus.
Is that true?
-What? -She left a couple hours ago.
translation.fr: Elle est partie il y a 2 h.

translation.en: I told you that opportunity wouldn't knock forever.
translation.fr:
Je t'avais dit
qu'une occasion est éphémère.

translation.en: You're right. It doesn't.
You.
It's Mark.
Do you want to have some lunch?
Yeah. Sure.
You're cooking.
I just wasted my whole goddamn afternoon...
...talking with the vice president of loans.
translation.fr: à parler avec le directeur des prêts.

translation.en: This asshole-- No, wait. He didn't even look me in the eye.
translation.fr:
Cet enfoiré ne me regardait même pas
dans les yeux.

translation.en: He just sat there, playing with this wooden thingy on his desk.
translation.fr:
Il n'a pas cessé de jouer
avec un truc en bois sur son bureau.

translation.en: -What thingy? What? -The long wooden block thingy.
translation.fr: Quel truc ? Le putain de truc en bois.

translation.en: The nameplate?
Yes. Nameplate.
Yeah, and?
And he's not gonna give me the money.
translation.fr: Il ne me donnera pas d'argent.

translation.en: -Are you sure? -Yes, I'm sure.
translation.fr:
Tu es sûre ? Certaine.
Je suis trop risquée.

translation.en: I'm not a good risk.
And I've got two days before the bank takes the club.
translation.fr:
Dans deux jours,
la banque saisit le club.

translation.en: Well, then...
...I would say that the situation is pretty bleak.
translation.fr: je dirais que la situation est sombre.

translation.en: And I would say that you are a master of the fucking obvious.
translation.fr:
Moi, je dirais
que tu es le roi de l'évidence.

translation.en: Why did you say that?
What do you mean, "Why did I say that"? Because it's the truth.
translation.fr:
Comment ça ?
Parce que c'est la vérité.

translation.en: Tess, it's not a judgment, it's the truth.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas une opinion,
c'est la vérité.

translation.en: You don't have any money.
The bank won't give you a loan. It's the eleventh hour. Hello?
translation.fr:
La banque ne t'en prêtera pas.
C'est la onzième heure.

translation.en: If I were you, I would take Marcus's offer now.
translation.fr:
A ta place,
j'accepterais l'offre de Marcus.

translation.en: And you don't get to say that to me.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas le droit de me dire ça.

translation.en: I can take "the sky is falling" from everyone else, but not you.
translation.fr:
N'importe qui peut me dire
"tout s'écroule", sauf toi.

translation.en: You know, I need you to be the one that says:
translation.fr: Tu dois être celui qui me dit :

translation.en: "It's only a number, Tess."
We have killed ourselves to keep this place going.
translation.fr:
On s'est défoncés
pour préserver cet endroit.

translation.en: How can you just walk away?
I don't care if you walk away, I don't care what happens.
translation.fr:
Je me fiche que tu t'en ailles,
de ce qui arrivera.

translation.en: I will beat down the door of every bank in L.A.
translation.fr: Je ferai toutes les banques de L.A.

translation.en: I will never give up this club.
Are you sure?
I will never give it up.
There she is.
I thought I'd lost you for a minute at the beginning there.
translation.fr: J'ai cru que je t'avais perdue.

translation.en: You are such an asshole.
Thank you.
Hope you're hungry. Steaks are on.
translation.fr:
J'espère que tu as faim.
Les steaks cuisent.

translation.en: What is this?
Right now it's a model.
When it grows up it'll be multi-use space...
translation.fr:
Une fois construit,
ce sera multi-usage.

translation.en: ...residential, retail.
But this is the Burlesque Lounge.
Best view on the Sunset Strip...
translation.fr: La plus belle vue sur Sunset Strip,

translation.en: ...with no windows.
When I'm through with it, it'll have a thousand.
translation.fr:
Une fois terminé,
il y en aura des milliers.

translation.en: Does Tess know about this?
-Tess knows I've made an offer to buy. -What makes you think she'd sell?
translation.fr: Tess sait que je lui ai fait une offre. Elle n'acceptera jamais.

translation.en: I don't think she has a choice. She's going under.
translation.fr:
Elle n'a pas le choix.
Mon offre est très généreuse.

translation.en: It's a win-win situation for everyone. It's business, not personal.
translation.fr:
Tout le monde y gagne.
C'est les affaires, rien de personnel.

translation.en: I think it's personal for Tess.
And for Coco and Sean and....
What about me?
There are other clubs that you can sing and dance in. Better ones.
translation.fr:
Il y a un tas de meilleurs cabarets
où tu peux te produire.

translation.en: You don't get it.
I don't understand. I'm trying to do something that benefits everyone.
translation.fr:
Je ne saisis pas.
J'essaye de satisfaire tout le monde.

translation.en: -How does that make me the bad guy? -It doesn't, Marcus.
translation.fr: Ça fait de moi le mec méchant ? Non, Marcus.

translation.en: It just makes you the wrong guy.
translation.fr: Ça fait de toi le mauvais mec.

translation.en: So how'd it go at the bank?
translation.fr:
Comment ça s'est passé
à la banque ?

translation.en: This good.
You want a glass for that?
No, no. I am way beyond a glass.
translation.fr: Non, je n'en suis plus là.

translation.en: -Tess, I gotta talk to you. -Not right now.
translation.fr:
- Je dois vous parler.
- Pas maintenant.

translation.en: Marcus is gonna tear down the club and build a skyscraper.
translation.fr: Marcus va construire un gratte-ciel ici.

translation.en: And how do you know this?
translation.fr:
- Comment le sais-tu ?
- J'ai vu la maquette.

translation.en: -I saw the model. -I didn't know you were close.
translation.fr:
- Comment le sais-tu ?
- J'ai vu la maquette. J'ignorais que vous étiez si proches.

translation.en: We're not. I rushed over so I could tell you.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas le cas.
Je suis venue vous avertir.

translation.en: You're spreading yourself a little bit thin.
translation.fr:
Tu ne te disperses pas un peu trop ?
Jack, Marcus...

translation.en: Jack, Marcus, whoever.
translation.fr:
Tu ne te disperses pas un peu trop ?
Jack, Marcus... Qui sais-je ?

translation.en: Tess, I'm trying to help you.
-Let it go. -She's gotta listen.
Okay. Let it go, let it go.
-She needs to listen. -She can't now.
Well, she's gonna hear me. Watch this.
Tess, I gotta talk to you.
-You could knock. This is still my office. -You need to hear what I tell you.
translation.fr:
Tu pourrais frapper,
c'est encore mon bureau pour 48 h. Alors, écoutez-moi.

translation.en: I don't. I am tired of talking. I am talked out.
translation.fr: Non. Je suis épuisée de parler.

translation.en: -Hear me out. -I don't wanna hear you out.
translation.fr: Vous devez m'écouter ! Je ne veux pas !

translation.en: Do you ever listen to anything other than your own voice?
translation.fr:
Il vous arrive d'écouter
autre chose que vous-même ?

translation.en: Talk.
Have you ever heard of air rights?
translation.fr: Vous connaissez les droits sur l'air ?

translation.en: No, I've never heard of air rights. What are air rights?
translation.fr:
Non, je n'en ai jamais entendu parler.
C'est quoi ?

translation.en: Now, that's funny.
Jim, let me call you back, huh?
Please sit down.
A few years ago you wanted to buy my club and I said no.
translation.fr:
J'avais refusé
de vous vendre le cabaret.

translation.en: Yeah, and now you changed your mind?
No, but just bear with me for a second...
...because I promise this is gonna have a happy ending for both of us.
translation.fr:
Je vous promets une fin heureuse
pour nous deux.

translation.en: How much you planning to sell your condos for?
translation.fr: A quel prix sont vos appartements ?

translation.en: Well, they start at a million and go up from there, depending on the view.
translation.fr:
Ça commence à 1 million,
ensuite ça dépend de la vue.

translation.en: That's beautiful.
So, what if I told you that a 20-story office building...
translation.fr:
Si je vous disais qu'un immeuble de 20 étages
va remplacer mon club ?

translation.en: ...was going up where my club is?
translation.fr:
qu'un immeuble de 20 étages
va remplacer mon club ?

translation.en: That would block his view.
-Ten stories would block his view. -Yeah. Gone.
The way I see it, your beautiful million-dollar ocean and city views...
translation.fr:
Ce que je vois, c'est que vos vues à 1 million
vont se volatiliser.

translation.en: ...are just gonna vanish into thin air.
translation.fr:
c'est que vos vues à 1 million
vont se volatiliser.

translation.en: -Vanish. -Yeah.
Because tomorrow I am going to sell my club to this developer...
translation.fr:
Parce que demain,
je vends mon cabaret à un promoteur,

translation.en: ...and his 20 stories are gonna be well underway by the time you start selling.
translation.fr:
et ses 20 étages émergeront avant
que vous ne commenciez à vendre.

translation.en: -Trying to sell. -Yeah. Right.
And so I think that we should talk.
I'd listen to her.
We're gonna have to auction off everything.
translation.fr: On va tout vendre aux enchères.

translation.en: Anything you want me to keep for you?
No.
I just wanna try and do what's best for both of us.
translation.fr:
Je vais faire
ce qui est bien pour nous deux.

translation.en: You gonna shoot me? Please?
translation.fr: Tu vas me tuer ? Je t'en supplie.

translation.en: No. I'm gonna buy you out.
In the next 24 hours?
No, in the next 24 seconds.
Where did you get this?
Thin air.
Oh, baby.
Thank you.
Just put it out in the universe.
What would really make me so happy...
translation.fr: Ce qui me ferait vraiment plaisir,

translation.en: ...is to hear from you...
...a great, big, giant, fat:
"Thank you, Ali."
I didn't sleep with Vince, I just said that to hurt you.
translation.fr:
J'ai pas couché avec Vince,
c'était pour te blesser.

translation.en: I crossed the line. You think?
translation.fr:
- J'ai dépassé les bornes.
- Tu crois ?

translation.en: I wanna come home.
translation.fr: Je veux rentrer à la maison.

translation.en: Okay, you're home.
Now get your ass upstairs and get ready, you're on in 20 minutes.
translation.fr:
Magne-toi le cul et va te changer,
c'est à toi dans 20 mn.

translation.en: And if you ever pull half of the crap that she pulled...
translation.fr:
Si tu fais la moitié des choses
qu'elle a faites,

translation.en: ...you are gonna be out so quick it's gonna make your head spin.
translation.fr:
je te virerai tellement vite
que tu en auras le tournis.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
And don't ever call me "ma'am" again.
I'm gonna go get dressed for the show.
Thank you, Ali.
So this is what happens when you get a little money?
translation.fr:
Voilà ce qui arrive
quand on touche un peu d'argent ?

translation.en: You stop doing manual labor. I'm back there with broken zippers...
translation.fr:
Plus de travaux manuels.
Je répare des fermetures éclair

translation.en: ...and ostrich feather fans that won't open or close.
translation.fr: et des éventails en plumes d'autruche.

translation.en: You have no idea what it's like. No idea.
I quit. Quit.
-Can I use this? -Don't touch my stuff.
translation.fr:
- Je peux prendre ça ?
- Ne touche pas à mes affaires !

translation.en: I've been looking for you.
Well, you found me.
I wanna talk to you.
I really have to get ready.
I know I messed up, okay? Bigtime.
When? When you lied to me about your engagement being over...
translation.fr:
Quand ? Quand tu m'as menti sur Natalie et toi
ou quand tu m'as virée ?

translation.en: ...or when you kicked me out?
translation.fr:
Quand tu m'as menti sur Natalie et toi
ou quand tu m'as virée ?

translation.en: It really was over. Okay? And she's gone.
translation.fr:
C'était vraiment terminé.
Elle est partie.

translation.en: I'm here to apologize.
I never should have let you walk out that door.
translation.fr: Je n'aurais jamais dû te laisser partir.

translation.en: Go on.
I want you to come back.
So, what's the proposal, exactly?
Well...
...I still have that full box of cookies.
translation.fr: j'ai toujours ma boîte de cookies.

translation.en: And an empty day bed.
I want the bedroom.
Half.
So are you in or are you out?
Oh, Jack. Now, see...
...I'm the kind of girl that, when a friend's in trouble, I help.
translation.fr:
je suis ce genre de fille : quand un ami a des ennuis,
je l'aide.

translation.en: That's just who I am.
Shut up.
I finished a song.
I think it's pretty good.
-Can I hear it? -No.
But you can sing it.
